name: proposal-builder
description: Internal proposal builder with PDF generation

scripts.build: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const path=require('path'); const onRender=!!process.env.RENDER; const cache=process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR || (onRender ? '/opt/render/.cache/puppeteer' : path.join(process.cwd(), '.cache', 'puppeteer')); const env={...process.env, PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR: cache}; console.log('[build] PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR=', cache); execSync('npx --yes puppeteer browsers install chrome', {stdio:'inherit', env});"
